author: John Hayward
description: Peter Schweizer told SiriusXM host Alex Marlow the firing of FBI Director James Comey was a “good thing” on Monday’s Breitbart News Daily.
title: Peter Schweizer: A Special Prosecutor Would Shut Trump’s Agenda

description: White House Press Secretary Sean Spicer repeatedly refused to answer reporters' questions about the existence of taped conversations between President Donald Trump and former FBI Director James Comey.
title: Spicer on Comey tapes: I've made it clear - CNN Video

author: Chris Strohm, Justin Sink
description: The two top officials at the Justice Department have interviewed eight candidates to replace the fired James Comey amid demands from lawmakers of both parties for Donald Trump to turn over any recordings he may have made of his meetings with the former FBI director.
title: Eight Candidates Interviewed for FBI Director Amid Comey Uproar
